attributes.title: AMOST DIED🟠✨
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to this app , but as soon as I opened the app every single secret service person told me to give this app 5 stars and if I didn’t they will do something terrible😳. But luckily I fought back👊🏽💪🏾. Then the app glitches to much and keeps playing music in the middle of no where.. Honestly I think this app is haunted. This app scares me and I don’t think it even deserves even 1 star 💫. It deserves 0 .

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is AWFUL it took 6 months just to download and there are so so so many glitches omg 🙄 it was very disappointing to see that bunker boy had his own app and i didn’t 😔 i am hurt and disgusted. also my house burned down after i downloaded i am so upset im going to be suing cheeto boy for this very reason 😡 i don’t even have words to express how bad this app is ugh 🤢 remove it immediately and apple, please do better❤️

attributes.title: Cheeto puff 2020 👹✨✨
attributes.review: I got this app and now my phone won’t stop glitching 😾😾 It keeps lagging and glitching out and sometimes won’t even let me out of the app. Terrible just awful! And unless you want to see an ugly orange rat Cheeto puff face, don’t download! Although I do have to say, I really admire how his hair barley stays on his head! I wish mine could that 😢 And I love his tan so much!11!1!! 💖👄💖ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆

attributes.title: Caused my fish to die
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes of improving my fish’s life- I had heard that using this app would ensure a speedy recovery of my pet fish. Upon opening the app, my eyes became overcome with what looked like a very small wiener man. I showed my fish, praying that the sight of the hot dog would help it survive. Instead, upon first glance of the non- kosher piece of meat, my fish died! It died! So disappointed in the app! I thought it would heal my fish. FAKE NEWS EVERYONE!!! THIS WEINER DOG RUINED MY FISH! PLEASE DON’T DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Slow
attributes.review: I sitting down all excited to get the app and play with my Cookie Monster on Crossy road and then Cookie Monster was like it ain’t given us cookies and I said you right, so I had continued to scroll and it kicked me out of crossy road so if not givin is a cookie and then kicking me out of crossy road I just had about enough so I had to tell Cookie Monster that It wasn’t worth our time sorry and app is really really really slow

attributes.title: Terrible app, made my phone glitch
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. The app made my phone glitch and I had to completely reset my phone. It also is to support some racist bigot who claims to be the world’s greatest leader. The man has not followed through with the promises he made for the country and has managed to take away rights for the LGBTQ+ community. Next my dog went missing and I found out that the “president” ATE him. DISGUSTING. The worst app on the app store

attributes.title: MADE ME SUICIDAL
attributes.review: This is the WORST app ever invented. whoever created this deserves to watch their children lowered into their graves. after i downloaded this app i broke out in hives, lost 85% of my vision, was laid off from my job, my wife sent me divorce papers, all of my children disowned me, AND i lost a good 3.5 inches off of my manhood. DO NOT, i repeat DO NOT download this app under ANY circumstances. for the safety of yourself and your family, stay as far away as possible from this app.

attributes.title: a toddler could have made this app!
attributes.review: the app took one month to download while i was downloading other apps and it downloaded in under a minute. as soon as i opened the app i was appalled at how ugly it was to look at 🙄 like come on u can do WAY better than that. i proceeded to try to use it but decided to delete it because it took 1 year to load anything on this terrible app (not an exaggeration).

attributes.title: The worst app on the store 🤬
attributes.review: It takes for ever to download. And when I try to open it it tell me that I need to sacrifice my first born child and devote myself to the orange devil. My mom kicked me out of my house be cause she found out and now I’m living on the streets. It keeps notifying me that I’m a failure and I need to give up to the orange devil. Now I’m mentally and physically scared cause I have been assaulted my masked white ghosts and hospitalized because of this app.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP😡
attributes.review: i was just minding my business showing my loyalty to a sexist, raciest, rapist, homophobic 🍊 president, when a SNAKE jumped throw the screen!!!! then the snake started eating my blue lives matter flag😡 even tho police are not blue and they’re killing innocent lives, I WILL STILL SHOW MY SUPPORT 🤪!!! so the snake ate my precious flag that i feel the need to show any chance i can get 😣. this snake ruined my life!! 1 star review, i won’t give it a zero because i love my orange president!!!😚😇🤣 -karen 😁
